duties_responsibilities.duty: Support day-to-day operations of the city, ensuring efficient processes and effective decision-making
Communicate effectively in written and oral forms, paying attention to detail in all communication
Understand the big-picture impacts of decisions and identify and correct errors and inefficiencies in processes
Participate in community growth initiatives and projects, contributing to the betterment of the city

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Public Administration, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
